.. _example_game:

Example Game
============

This game shows examples of what things can be done with the library,
to run it just unzip and run main.py while having **pygame** and **pygame_ai**
installed.

    * `Download Example Game <https://mega.nz/#!bktFECRQ!bTVdMJpuSSIut0wZUmTodmNbbamYKd3jbt6XLLU7cuY>`_
